channel.title: Any way to find info on a person...?
channel.description: Is there any way to search for information about a person on the internet? (Example what degrees they have etc.)

item.title: Any way to find info on a person...?
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

[quote=“leader, post:11, topic:100632”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=144434.msg1380866#msg1380866 date=1180242798]
I can’t find my self in google.
[/quote]

I can’t either.[/quote]me either

Read full topic

item.title: Any way to find info on a person...?
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

Gross…I found a picture of me in the state newspaper…(Luckily, that was the only mention of myself).

Cia.gov. I’m sure you can find information on anybody there if you know how to use it right ;).

item.title: Any way to find info on a person...?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

offtopic but i havent seen my dad since i was six… using google i managed to find where he lives right now (Well did in 2005, probably hasnt moved)
tbh you just got to be lucky and hope that the person you are searching for has been on the internet some how and hopefully left a trace of themselves.

Read full topic

item.title: Any way to find info on a person...?
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

Mr.Chris:

I think he’s talking about someone he knows vaguely, but not famous. I might be wrong, but I think you’ll get too many results.

Well I googled my name and found one result, which happens to be me.

Read full topic

item.title: Any way to find info on a person...?
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:3, topic:100632”][quote author=kMB link=topic=144434.msg1378919#msg1378919 date=1180218212]
Yes, type the persons name (with quote marks) to google and browse the results.
[/quote]

No, not really…That wont help unless the person has a uncommon name.

There are some commercial services out there, not sure about free ones though,[/quote]Dude, about the only name it won’t work for is “John Doe”. You should be fine doing that, or search on yellow pages.

Read full topic
